Instance.description: Situation goal that completes when multiple sims of interest have a tuned relbit toward one another. Sims of interest is a concept that depends on the type of object this SituationGoal is attached to. For example, this can be all sims in a situation if this is attached to a situation. Or this can be all sims in a scenario if this SituationGoal is attached to a scenario.

TunableVariant.name: rel_bit_count_strategy
TunableVariant.description: The number of relbits we're looking for. All Possible: This will test against every sim having the relbit with every other sim. Tuned Literal: This will test a tuned number of sims having the relbit with one another.

TunableTuple.name: all_possible
TunableTuple.description: Counting strategy that tests against all sims of interest having a given relationship with one another.

TunableList.name: allowed_species
TunableList.description: Only relationships with sims of these species are considered for the goal. For example, if the goal is testing that all sims in the household are friends with each other, we would want to constrain this to be HUMAN only because dogs and cats use a different set of relationship bits.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the target relationship count.

TunableList.name: rel_bits
TunableList.description: A list of Rel Bit entries.

TunableTuple.description: Tuning for a single Rel Bit and whether we require it to be present or absent in the target relationships.

TunableVariant.name: action
TunableVariant.description: Whether we are checking for the presence or absence of the tuned Rel Bit. Require - We are checking for the presence of this Rel Bit. Prohibit - We are checking for the absence of this Rel Bit.

Tunable.name: rel_bit
Tunable.description: The type of relationship we're looking for. In other words, we're looking for any relationship with this Rel Bit.

TunableTuple.name: tuned_literal
TunableTuple.description: Counting strategy that tests against some tuned number of sims of interest having a given relationship with one another.

Tunable.name: _target_relationship_bit_count
Tunable.description: The number of relationship bits that this goal is testing against.
